label: cascading_failure_01_dx_storage_capacity_026
content:
## 2026-01-27 Daily Operations Summary

### Endpoint Performance
- /storage/cluster/usage: REQUESTS req | p50: 120ms p95: 250ms p99: 400ms | err: 0.2% (2 errors) | success: 99.8%
- /storage/node/utilization: REQUESTS req | p50: 80ms p95: 180ms p99: 300ms | err: 0.1% (1 error) | success: 99.9%
- /storage/rebalance/status: REQUESTS req | p50: 60ms p95: 130ms p99: 220ms | err: 0.3% (3 errors) | success: 99.7%
- /storage/compaction/run: REQUESTS req | p50: 70ms p95: 160ms p99: 290ms | err: 0.2% (2 errors) | success: 99.8%
- /storage/io/metrics: REQUESTS req | p50: 90ms p95: 200ms p99: 350ms | err: 0.4% (4 errors) | success: 99.6%
- /storage/metadata/db: REQUESTS req | p50: 85ms p95: 190ms p99: 330ms | err: 0.1% (1 error) | success: 99.9%
- /storage/quota/status: REQUESTS req | p50: 75ms p95: 170ms p99: 310ms | err: 0.2% (2 errors) | success: 99.8%
- /storage/ingest/metrics: REQUESTS req | p50: 65ms p95: 150ms p99: 280ms | err: 0.3% (3 errors) | success: 99.7%
- /storage/reliability/status: REQUESTS req | p50: 95ms p95: 210ms p99: 370ms | err: 0.2% (2 errors) | success: 99.8%
- /storage/metadata/cache: REQUESTS req | p50: 80ms p95: 180ms p99: 320ms | err: 0.1% (1 error) | success: 99.9%

### Infrastructure
- stor-a-01: CPU 82% | Mem 87% | Disk Used 99% | Conns: 1200 | Net: 9.0/8.2 Mbps
- stor-b-21: CPU 72% | Mem 80% | Disk Used 98% | Conns: 950 | Net: 7.6/7.1 Mbps
- stor-c-24: CPU 66% | Mem 75% | Disk Used 96% | Conns: 820 | Net: 6.6/6.2 Mbps
- meta-01: CPU 78% | Mem 95% | Disk Used 90% | Conns: 670 | Net: 4.4/3.9 Mbps

### Connection Pools
- pool-storage-requests: active 1500 | idle 300 | waiting 50 | exhaustion: 0 | max: 2000 | avg_wait: 12ms
- pool-db-connections: active 200 | idle 50 | waiting 10 | exhaustion: 0 | max: 300 | avg_wait: 8ms
- pool-cache-lookup: active 800 | idle 150 | waiting 20 | exhaustion: 0 | max: 1000 | avg_wait: 5ms
- pool-rebalance: active 12 | idle 3 | waiting 2 | exhaustion: 0 | max: 20 | avg_wait: 15ms

### CDN & Caching
- Hit rate: 92% | Bandwidth: 3.5 Gbps | Origin requests: 12000

### Alerts
- [CRITICAL] disk_failure on stor-a-01: 1 failure
- [WARNING] node_restart on stor-b-21: 1 restart
- [WARNING] scrub_errors: 30 on storage system
- [INFO] quota_hard_blocks: 6
- [INFO] quota_soft_limit_hits: 38

### Deployments & Changes
- No firmware updates or kernel patches performed.
- Network drops recorded: 20 incidents.
- Scheduled maintenance included network adjustments and audit log collection of 90 GB.

### Events
- Two-stage compaction surge reduced pending from 138 to 110; scrub errors fell to 30 and fsync p95 improved to 15.8 ms.
- Completed 15 rebalance jobs, improving skew index to 1.02 and keeping hottest node under 98.5%.
- Disk failure addressed with 7.0-hour rebuild; rebalancer excluded rebuilding node to avoid I/O contention.
- Quota hard blocks reduced from 7 to 6 after enforcing pause on non-critical backfills and continuing EC migration for cold datasets.

### On-Call
- Shift: Fatima A. 7 pages. 14 tickets. Status: Stable but operating in emergency capacity mode. Backlogs improved; strict quotas and scheduled compaction remain in effect until expansion lands.
